segment.source: Administering App-V 5.1 by Using PowerShell

segment.source: Administering App-V 5.1 by Using PowerShell

segment.source: Administering App-V 5.1 by Using PowerShell
segment.target: Administering App-V 5.1 by Using PowerShell

segment.source: Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 provides Windows PowerShell cmdlets, which can help administrators perform various App-V 5.1 tasks.
segment.target: Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 provides Windows PowerShell cmdlets, which can help administrators perform various App-V 5.1 tasks.

segment.source: The following sections provide more information about using PowerShell with App-V 5.1.
segment.target: The following sections provide more information about using PowerShell with App-V 5.1.

segment.source: How to administer App-V 5.1 by using PowerShell
segment.target: How to administer App-V 5.1 by using PowerShell

segment.source: Use the following PowerShell procedures to perform various App-V 5.1 tasks.
segment.target: Use the following PowerShell procedures to perform various App-V 5.1 tasks.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: How to Load the PowerShell Cmdlets and Get Cmdlet Help
segment.target: How to Load the PowerShell Cmdlets and Get Cmdlet Help

segment.target: Describes how to install the PowerShell cmdlets and find cmdlet help and examples.

segment.target: How to Sequence a Package by Using PowerShell

segment.source: How to Create a Package Accelerator by Using PowerShell
segment.target: How to Create a Package Accelerator by Using PowerShell

segment.source: Describes how to create a package accelerator using PowerShell.
segment.target: Describes how to create a package accelerator using PowerShell.

segment.source: You can use package accelerators automatically sequence large, complex applications.
segment.target: You can use package accelerators automatically sequence large, complex applications.

segment.source: How to Enable Reporting on the App-V 5.1 Client by Using PowerShell
segment.target: How to Enable Reporting on the App-V 5.1 Client by Using PowerShell

segment.source: Describes how to enable the computer running the App-V 5.1 to send reporting information.
segment.target: Describes how to enable the computer running the App-V 5.1 to send reporting information.

segment.source: How to Install the App-V Databases and Convert the Associated Security Identifiers by Using PowerShell
segment.target: How to Install the App-V Databases and Convert the Associated Security Identifiers by Using PowerShell

segment.source: Describes how to take an array of account names and to convert each of them to the corresponding SID in standard and hexadecimal formats.
segment.target: Describes how to take an array of account names and to convert each of them to the corresponding SID in standard and hexadecimal formats.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Make sure that any script you execute with your App-V packages matches the execution policy that you have configured for PowerShell.
segment.target: Make sure that any script you execute with your App-V packages matches the execution policy that you have configured for PowerShell.

segment.source: If a package name contains the character ( ), you must use a single-quote ( ‘ ), for example,
segment.target: If a package name contains the character ( ), you must use a single-quote ( ‘ ), for example,
